text: Yoshihiro "Yosh" Uchida (April 1, 1920 â€“ June 27, 2024) was an American businessman, entrepreneur, judo coach and educator. He was best known for his works to judo. Uchida was the head judo coach at San Jose State University for over 70 years. He played a leading part in the development of the university's judo program. He was born in California.2004; Yeh, Emerald; ""Yoshihiro Uchida" ; Asian Pacific Fund; url accessed January 1, 2007 During World War II, while members of his family were sent to internment camps. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Educators from California Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Sportspeople from California
